title: Topic 002 Question 015
body: You need to be alerted when users share sensitive documents from Microsoft OneDrive to any users outside your company.
options: From the Microsoft 365 compliance center, create a data loss prevention (DLP) policy.
From the Microsoft 365 compliance center, start a data investigation.
From the Microsoft 365 compliance center, create an insider risk policy.
From the Cloud App Security portal, create an activity policy.
